stories.text: I advise startups in building a Talent organization. Advise a candidate centric approach. Coach and advise candidates in a more targeted search approach.
stories.title: Coach, Mentor, Advisor in Talent Acquisition

stories.text:
It seems that it would be useful to automatically archive the links submitted to HN, both to Archive.org and archive.is. Does anyone have a bot doing this currently?

Seems like https://www.gwern.net/Archiving-URLs would also be highly relevant.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are links submitted to HN automatically archived?
Types of Technical Interviews: Different flavors of technical assessments
Poor science reporting and premature enthusiasm

stories.text: I'm looking to build a poker bot and want advice from people that have actually attempted it. What was your general approach to building it? Did you see profits at a small scale / at low stakes? What prevented you from scaling it to many instances running on multiple sites?
stories.title: Ask HN: Has anyone built a poker bot?
Silicon chip fabrication at home: laser doping
